snippet.title: The ladle fly - Indie Halloween Game
snippet.description:
🏡 Buzzy's Home Adventure: Help the Quirky Fly Build Her Dream House! 🏡

Join Buzzy, our lovably odd cross-eyed fly, on a whimsical journey to construct her dream home in this charming and addictive game! Buzzy has a variety of objects at her disposal, from fireplaces and garages to delicious sweets. However, she must also navigate through obstacles like spiders, zombies, and ghosts to find the perfect components for her cozy abode.

🎮 Gameplay Highlights:

- Explore diverse levels to collect essential items for Buzzy's house.
- Use intuitive controls: fly, move left or right, jump, and interact with objects.
- Encounter unique enemies such as spiders, ghosts, zombies, bats, and even tornadoes (coming in the next update).
- Enjoy delightful sounds, including ambient music, wing sounds, and even a homemade fly fart (just for fun!).

🎨 Artwork:
- Admire charming illustrations of Buzzy, delectable sweets, bombs (coming in the next update), Buzzy's house, and upcoming enemies (spiders, ghosts, zombies, bats, and tornadoes in the next update).

🔊 Sounds:
- Immerse yourself in the game with ambient music created with Audacity.
- Experience the realistic sounds of wings flapping.
- Don't miss the quirky touch of Buzzy's homemade fly fart!

🙌 Support the Development:
- Help us continue creating fun and engaging content by supporting me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/d4fgames
- Consider buying me a coffee to fuel more exciting updates and improvements! https://ko-fi.com/R6R216MSF

🕹️ Play Now and Let Buzzy Build Her Dream Home!
https://lythande.itch.io/the-ladle-fly

🚀 Subscribe for More Updates and Exciting Content!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ4dhshzpVbbRPVuL9TNH4Q/

#BuzzyGame #HomeAdventure #IndieGame #GamingCommunity #FlyAdventure #SupportIndieDevelopers 🚀

Created for the Halloween Gamejam 2017.
